articles.title: Gen. Stanley McChrystal on what would close the divide in America - CBS News
articles.description: The retired four-star general says the political divisions tearing apart the very fabric of American society can be healed by bringing together young people towards a common purpose.
articles.content: Political divisions are tearing our nation apart. Perhaps not since the last decade before our Civil War have differing perspectives so threatened the very fabric of American society. Many of us have… [+2147 chars]
